info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 5:25AM EST until January 03 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CST FOR CHRISTIAN COUNTY... At 424 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Crofton to 7 miles north of Big Rock, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crofton, Hopkinsville, Fort Campbell, Oak Grove and Pembroke. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 71 and 91. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 25. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for south central and western Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
